title: The Best Frappuccinos to Order On Starbucks' Secret Menu

steps.content: With blackberries, vanilla bean, and matcha powder, this magical secret menu drink is straight out of a fairytale! Ask your barista to pour the custom drizzle around the edge of the cup before adding in the frappuccino mixture to clearly see both shades of purple and green (and create the perfect shot for Instagram). [1] X Research source How to order: Request a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino with 3 scoops of blackberry inclusions. Then, ask for a drizzle made with 8 pumps of white mocha syrup, 3 pumps of toasted coconut syrup, and 3 scoops of matcha powder.

Featuring notes of vanilla, raspberry, and strawberry, this secret menu frappuccino reminds us of wild berry Skittles—aka the best kind. If you like, ask for whipped cream and strawberry puree on top to add a smooth texture and extra berry-licious flavor. [2] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Strawberries & Crème Frappuccino without classic syrup, and add 3 pumps of vanilla syrup and 1 pump of raspberry syrup.

Holly, jolly, and delicious, the Santa Clause Frappuccino is a comforting blend of vanilla bean and strawberry. The red and white swirls in the drink capture the spirit of the most wonderful time of year, bringing you joy that makes you feel like a kid again. [3] X Research source How to order: Request a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino with strawberry puree added to the bottom of the cup and in the middle of the drink. Fill the rest of the drink with the frappuccino mixture, then top it off with whipped cream and seasonal sprinkles.

The next time you watch (or rewatch) episodes of Stranger Things, sip on this Demogorgon-inspired drink to really get into the spirit. The subtle notes of strawberry and chocolate complement the earthiness of the matcha, elevating the flavors of your standard Green Tea Frap. [4] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Green Tea Frappuccino with 1 scoop of matcha powder, 1 scoop of java chips, and 1 pump of white mocha. Request strawberry puree at the bottom of the cup, then top with whipped cream and mocha drizzle.

Made to look like the iconic Pokéman ball, this clever creation is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth. It’s the perfect blend of vanilla, raspberry, and strawberry flavors—giving you the energy to help you catch 'em all! [5] X Research source How to order: Ask for half Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino (at the bottom of your cup) and half Strawberry Crème Frappuccino (on top). Top with whipped cream, raspberry syrup, and strawberry puree.

Take a trip down memory lane with this fun and festive frap. It’s the perfect blend of berries, vanilla, and cream—guaranteed to make you go, “Yabba Dabba Doo!” [6] X Research source How to order: Request a Strawberries & Crème Frappuccino with 2 pumps of vanilla syrup, 1 pump of raspberry syrup, and a splash of orange-mango juice (if they have it).

This secret menu sipper is sure to be a winner! Matching the color of the show’s logo (and the guards’ outfits), the Squid Game Frappuccino features notes of fruit, chocolate, and coffee flavors, making it a truly unique and exciting experience. [7] X Research source How to order: Request a Strawberries & Crème Frappuccino with 1 scoop of dragon fruit inclusions, 2 pumps of white mocha, and mocha drizzle.

Celebrate the cutest character in the galaxy with this sweet and creamy drink. The Baby Yoda frappuccino combines earthy matcha and sweet caramel—an unexpected pairing that’s out of this world delicious. [8] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Matcha Crème Frappuccino lined with caramel drizzle, then top with whipped cream, extra caramel, and caramel ribbon crunchies.

Enter the wizarding world with this sweet and spellbinding sipper! It tastes exactly like a butterscotch cream soda with notes of caramel and nutty syrup. [9] X Research source How to order: Request a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino with 3 pumps of caramel and 3 pumps of toffee nut syrup. Top with whipped cream and caramel drizzle.

This Harry Potter-inspired drink is just as vibrant and delicious as you think. With strawberry, coffee, and vanilla flavors, it’s the perfect pick-me-up during the middle of the day (or anytime you’re craving something sweet). [10] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Strawberries & Cream Frappuccino with 1 shot of espresso and 1 pump of vanilla syrup.

This Barbie Frappuccino is everything. Bring your Barbie fantasy to life with this pink, picture-perfect drink. Featuring vanilla and dragon fruit, it’s a balanced blend of sweet and fruity flavors. [11] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino with 2 pumps of vanilla syrup and 1 scoop of dragon fruit inclusions. Top with whipped cream.

Trying to overcome your mid-afternoon slump? This superhero-inspired sipper is here to save the day! It combines white chocolate, caramel, and strawberry flavors, and with just one sip, you’ll feel like you can conquer the world. [12] X Research source How to order: Request a Strawberries & Crème Frappuccino made without classic syrup. Add 2 pumps of white mocha sauce and caramel drizzle.

If you’re searching for a fruity drink that isn’t too sweet, you can’t beat this secret menu frap. The tart lemonade tones down the sweetness of the vanilla, creating the perfect balance of sweet and slightly sour flavors. [13] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Blended Strawberry Lemonade with 1 scoop of vanilla bean powder, then top with whipped cream and matcha powder.

If you’re an Arianator, this secret menu sipper is screaming your name! With notes of vanilla, coffee, caramel, and cream, it’s super sweet (and sure to wake you up). [14] X Research source How to order: Request a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino blended with 1 pump of mocha syrup and java chips. Top with extra whipped cream and caramel drizzle.

If you can’t take a trip to your local theme park this year, try this secret menu sipper for a sweet taste of summertime. The Churro Frap is the perfect blend of cinnamon, sugar, and white mocha—reminiscent of your favorite fried food truck pastry. [15] X Research source How to order: Request a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino with 1.5 pumps of cinnamon dolce syrup, 1.5 pumps of white mocha sauce, and cinnamon. Top with whipped cream, caramel drizzle, and cinnamon.

Looking for a sweet and tangy treat? Try the Lemon Bar Frappuccino for a slightly tart drink that’s sure to quench your thirst. Some say it tastes just like Chick-Fil-A’s frosted lemonade. [16] X Research source How to order: Request a Crème Base Frappuccino with lemonade filled to the first line, whole milk filled to the second line, 2 pumps of classic syrup, 2 pumps of vanilla syrup, and topped with whipped cream.

Inspired by the iconic Wendy’s frosty, this secret menu frappuccino is dessert in drink form. It’s sweet, creamy, and oh so dreamy…What more could you ask for? [17] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Mocha Frappuccino with heavy cream instead of milk. Add 2 pumps of vanilla syrup, and top with mocha drizzle.

If you’re a Ferrerro Rocher fan, this frappuccino is for you! Reminiscent of the iconic chocolate hazelnut truffle, it’s sure to hit the spot anytime you’re craving a sugary treat. [18] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Double Chocolate Chip Frappuccino with 3 pumps of mocha sauce, 1.5 pumps of hazelnut syrup, and top with hazelnut drizzle.

Mimicking the flavor of malted milk balls, this secret menu drink is decadent and delicious. It combines mocha, vanilla, and strawberry flavors, making it the perfect treat after a long day. [19] X Research source How to order: Request a Mocha Cookie Crumble Frappuccino with 1 scoop of vanilla bean powder and 1 scoop of strawberry inclusions.

Inspired by Reese’s, this secret menu drink is a peanut butter lover’s dream. It combines smooth chocolate with nutty syrup—the ultimate match made in heaven! [20] X Research source How to order: Request a Mocha Frappuccino made with soy milk instead of whole milk. Add 3 pumps of toffee nut syrup, and top with whipped cream and mocha drizzle.

Craving something tangy and sweet? This secret menu sipper is the perfect treat! With cream, peach, and dragon fruit flavors, it tastes shockingly similar to a pink Starburst. [21] X Research source How to order: Request a Crème Base Frappuccino with heavy cream instead of milk. Ask for peach juice and 1 scoop of dragon fruit inclusions blended in, and whipped cream on the top and bottom of the cup. Top with dragon fruit inclusions.

If you’re in desperate need of caffeine, this drink is sure to put some pep in your step. The pairing of espresso and vanilla bean gives you a quick boost of energy (and tastes just like a dream). How to order: Request a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino with 2 floating espresso shots, and top with whipped cream.

Brighten up your day with this sweet and refreshing drink. It’s the perfect blend of cream and berry flavors, making it the perfect summertime pick-me-up. [22] X Research source How to order: Request a Strawberry Crème Frappuccino without classic syrup, then add 2 pumps of raspberry syrup.

Turn anywhere into a vacation with this tropical treat. With coconut and dragon fruit flavors, it’s reminiscent of palm trees, sandy beaches, and warm sun. [23] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Crème Base Frappuccino with coconut milk filled to the first line, mango dragon fruit refresher filled to the second line, and 2 scoops of dragon fruit inclusions. Top with whipped cream.

Juicy citrus meets sweet cream in this refreshing secret menu sipper. The Orange Creamsicle Frappuccino tastes exactly like its name, making it the perfect drink for a hot summer’s day. [24] X Research source How to order: Request a custom drink with orange-mango juice to the first line, milk to the second line, 3 pumps of classic syrup, and 2 pumps of crème based. Top with whipped cream.

Pastel pink and oh so delectable to drink, this secret menu sipper is a taste of nostalgia. It features strawberry, raspberry, and peach flavors, bringing back memories of childhood summers. [25] X Research source How to order: Order a Strawberries & Crème Frappuccino made without strawberry puree. Add 1 pump of peach syrup, 1 pump of raspberry syrup, 3 pumps of crème base, and 1 scoop of vanilla bean powder.

Described as a rainbow of flavors, this secret menu frappuccino is a fresh take on a childhood classic. It’s fruity, sweet, and creamy—everything you love about a banana split in drink form! [26] X Research source How to order: Request a Strawberries & Crème Frappuccino blended with a banana, java chips, and 1 scoop of vanilla bean powder. Top with whipped cream, mocha drizzle, and caramel drizzle.

If you’re looking for a dessert-inspired drink, look no further—this secret menu frappuccino is sure to curb your cravings! It’s sweet, rich, creamy, and just as delicious as the real deal. [27] X Research source How to order: Request a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino blended with a banana, 1 pump of vanilla syrup, and 2 pumps of cinnamon dolce syrup.

If you’re a fan of raspberry cheesecake, this secret menu drink might be your dream come true. It’s a creamy combination of raspberry, chocolate, and coffee flavors, making it a decadent treat at the end of the week. [28] X Research source How to order: Ask for a White Chocolate Mocha Frappuccino with 2 pumps of raspberry syrup, then top with a drizzle of raspberry syrup.

Sweet, refreshing, and slightly tangy, this secret menu drink screams spring. It features strawberries, cream, cinnamon, and caramel…What’s not to love? [29] X Research source How to order: Request a White Chocolate Mocha Frappuccino with 1 pump of toffee nut syrup, strawberry puree at the bottom of the cup, and caramel crunch topping.

Celebrate everyday like it’s your birthday with this festive frap. It tastes just as sweet and delicious as it sounds, making you say, “let them drink cake!” [30] X Research source How to order: Request a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino with 2 pumps of hazelnut syrup, then top with whipped cream.

The flavors of warm apple pie and vanilla ice cream meet in this sweet secret menu drink. It’s creamy, rich, and comforting—the perfect frappuccino for fall. [31] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Crème Base Frappuccino with apple juice filled to the bottom line, 2 pumps of cinnamon dolce syrup, and whipped cream blended in. Line the cup with caramel drizzle, and top with more whipped cream and caramel.

Step aside, pumpkin spice—this secret menu sipper is even more warm and cozy. While the Pumpkin Pie Frappuccino is only available in October and November, it’s a fan-favorite from the secret menu, with some saying it tastes just like fall in a cup. [32] X Research source How to order: Request a Pumpkin Spice Frappuccino with 1.5 pumps of cinnamon dolce syrup and whipped cream. Top with cinnamon dolce sprinkles.

With vanilla, cinnamon, and lime, this secret menu frap captures the flavors of a perfectly baked key lime pie. The combination of fruit and cream tastes exactly like the filling, while notes of cinnamon and vanilla mimic the golden graham cracker crust. [33] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Cool Lime Refresher made with whole milk, 1 pump of cinnamon dolce syrup, 2 pumps of vanilla syrup, 2 pumps of white mocha syrup, and whipped cream.

Have your cake and drink it too with this chocolatey raspberry delight. It’s one of the most popular frappuccinos off the secret menu (for good reason), and it’s just as rich and decadent as its name. [34] X Research source How to order: Request a custom drink that’s half White Chocolate Mocha, half regular Mocha Frappuccino. Add 2 pumps of raspberry syrup, then top with whipped cream.

Looking for a sweet drink that reminds you of summer? This frappuccino is a delicious take on a blackberry cobbler. It tastes exactly like blackberries, biscuits, and cream, and it’s just as dreamy as the real thing. [35] X Research source How to order: Ask for a Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino with 1.5 pumps of white mocha syrup, and 1 scoop of freeze-dried blackberries.

Think of the Peppermint Bark Frappuccino as the cooler cousin of the Peppermint Mocha. With mint, coffee, and chocolate flavors, it gives you an instant boost of energy (and tastes like a dream). [36] X Research source How to order: Request a custom drink that’s half Mocha, half White Chocolate Mocha Frappuccino. Add 2 pumps of peppermint syrup, and top with whipped cream and mocha drizzle.

Also known as the Oreo Frappuccino, this secret menu drink is sweet, creamy, and decadent. It tastes just like your favorite childhood cookies, with a kick of rich coffee. If you want the caffeine-free version, order the White Chocolate Crème Frappuccino instead of the Mocha Cookie Crumble. [37] X Research source How to order: Request a Mocha Cookie Crumble Frappuccino with white chocolate mocha sauce instead of mocha sauce. Top with whipped cream and mocha drizzle.

Move over, McDonald’s! This green drink is even more creamy, dreamy, and delicious. The Shamrock Shake Frappuccino is a cooling blend of mint, matcha, and vanilla, finished off with fluffy whipped cream and java chips. [38] X Research source How to order: Request a Green Tea Frappuccino with 2 pumps of vanilla syrup, 2 pumps of peppermint syrup. Top with whipped cream and java chips.

This secret menu sipper is dreamy, decadent, and delicious. It tastes similar to chocolate-covered berries, and with just one sip, you’ll be in love! [39] X Research source How to order: Request a Strawberries & Crème Frappuccino with 1 pump of raspberry syrup and 1 scoop of java chips. Top with mocha drizzle and cookie crumbles.

Warm, rich, and nutty, this secret menu drink is what dreams are made of. The combination of mocha, chocolate, and toffee mimics the taste of maple syrup. Plus, it’s super simple to order so you won’t feel like you’re burdening your barista. [40] X Research source How to order: Ask for a White Chocolate Mocha Frappuccino with 2 pumps of toffee nut syrup, topped with whipped cream.
